data.message: You have made the screen smaller and filled it with more ads. There is a plane missing, possibly in great danger. You insist on advertising a game with the object as shooting planes down!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Stop thinking of the "Almighty dollar and consider human beings for once!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I am totally annoyed with FB right now!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.message: What Almighty Dollar??  This is a FREE Site!!!
The "Paid Ads" aren't Free people pay to have their ads put on so FB is making money for those ads.
If it's a free site why is creator of face book loaded with money money and more money
ya everything seems smushed into the middle of the page and got a bunch of empty space on the sides.

The game is being advertised by FB to pay for FB, as ads pay for the "free" TV you watch..... I don't want to see planes being shot down at my expense so the "Fat Cats" can get fatter. Or roaches or rats running across the screen either.
yeah duh Mark didn't get to be a billionaire by this be a totally free website
Facebook caters to advertisers, it is how they make their money.  This, essentially, makes us the product being sold to companies.

The header/task bar used to be locked at the top of the screen so you could hit the Home button or your own page without having to use the scroll bar on the left hand side of the screen.  Please relock it at the top, it is a pain in the butt to have to scroll back up to the top!!!
